meanings.sent1: The newmown hay smelled sweet in the barn.
meanings.sent2: The farmer admired the newmown field of wheat.
meanings.sent3: The newmown grass seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The newmown garden was a canvas of green and gold.
meanings.sent5: The newmown meadow glistened in the morning sun.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed the scent of newmown flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The newmown lawn looked neat and tidy.
meanings.sent3: The newmown hay bales played hide and seek with the wind.
meanings.sent4: The newmown wheat field whispered secrets to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The newmown crops swayed gently in the breeze.
